text: <@UJG9WTEKG> - I'm seeing org charts here, but no content career ladder/matrix. In other words, what are the different job levels/roles within the content org (Associate Content Marketer, Lead, Manager, etc.)  and what are the responsibilities and skills expected of each? This is something an HoC would put together with support from HR.
